TopicTitle: How do you post a picture?

Articles.Content: How do you post a picture from your computer? Someone help me! It would be appreciated!

First, upload to a site like imgur.com.

Then use the code they give you to add into a post. Remember to use spoiler tags on large images to help keep the forum tidy.

You can also attach the picture directly to your post, though this is not recommended. Just click the 'Attachments and of options' link below the message area.

Cheers!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
